topic.title: Working out in a gym is for narcissistic fools
topic.body:
Who do you want to prove something to?

Stop wasting your time in a stinky gym with your stinky monkey friends and make a sport that you really enjoy

1566634528_1JaHtdmFGhdNVCzJquH7hFpsKbF7c.body:
Any indoor sport is nothing but boring.
To me the meaning of sport is increasing Endorphin. Not more and not less. Riding a bike in a beautiful forest for example is real sport.
